storyInfo: Kirara, bound for treatment at Rhodes Island, misses Utage and gets in someone else's car by mistake. A long, long journey takes a treacherous turn at the very end.

attributes.content: Utage?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Akafuyu?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I was gonna meet up with Kirara here. You seen her?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: What? The girl coming for treatment? You arranged to meet here too?!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Hey, uh, guide?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: (Raises head for a glance)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: (Lifts phone, points it at the highway scenery)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: (Continues tapping on phone)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Ms. Guide—
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: (Taps on phone screen)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Whaddaya showing me your phone for...
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: 'guide...'
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: And then a question mark?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: You're not the guide who's supposed to show me outta the city?!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: (Taps on phone screen)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Then why'd you get in my car? The hell, did the L.G.D. send you?!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: (Taps on phone screen)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Quit typing and talk to me!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I thought...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Clearly now!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I thought you were... the driver taking me to Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: 'Scuse me, you see a girl dragging this giant case around here?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: A girl with a giant case? Can't say I have.
attributes.name: Male Passerby

attributes.content: You're an hour late, you only just got here! Of course you haven't seen anything!
attributes.name: Female Passerby

attributes.content: Miss, are you talking about a teenaged girl towing a big suitcase, about as tall as you?
attributes.name: Female Passerby

attributes.content: Yeah, her! Was she, like, super-absorbed in a hand thingy playing a video game when you saw her?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Can't say as such.
attributes.name: Female Passerby

attributes.content: Come again?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: She was playing on something that seemed like a game console for a little bit, but then she put it away really fast, and pulled out her phone right after, and she'd just type and then send photos.
attributes.name: Female Passerby

attributes.content: Phone?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: (Her phone's gonna be from Higashi. Can she use it in Lungmen?)
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: (Nah, no time to sweat that.)
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Should be her, for sure. Do you know where she went?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: A car just stopped in front of her a moment ago, and then the driver and her had this look between them, and she took her suitcase and got in. The driver even moved it into the boot for her.
attributes.name: Female Passerby

attributes.content: Where's the car headed?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Unbelievable...
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: My goddamn luck. The guide I book just so happens to be a young Ægir woman in a Higashinese outfit... How the hell does a stumbling block like you come outta the woodwork?!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: If you got something to say, then say it!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I just wanted to ask... why... you thought I was wearing Higashinese clothing?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: You're garbed up like you walked right outta one of them Higashinese mangos. If that's not the look, what is?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I think you only really look stereotypically Higashinese if you dress like a samurai or a miko or...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Samurai? Miko? Isn't that all just manga stuff? They really got types like that walking around over there?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Uh... never mind.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: What are you... driving this... fast for?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Huh? I'm trying to get home!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: See, but was gonna meet up with a friend and she was waiting literally where I got in this car... and could you just take me back before you go home?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Fuhgeddaboutit!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Orrr... where do you live? You could go home first and then I'll find a way to get my friend to pick me up...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: My home's in Siracusa. That good enough for you?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: S-S-Siracusa?!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: That's NG, that's totally not happening! I came here all the way from Higashi, I don't have time for a trip to Siracusa too!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Grgh.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: See this knife here, ragazza?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Don't tell me you're with... the mafia? The Siracusan mafia?!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Not exactly... but yeah, something like that.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: You sit tight and make peace with it. You're my hostage now.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: But... you said you missed your guide, so even if you leave Lungmen you still...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Shut it! I ain't giving you no second chance!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: That stupid pickpocket didn't just rob a jewelers, he went and nabbed a hostage...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Truly sorry, Miss Akafuyu, that we requested cooperation with Rhodes Island on this investigation and still let this mess happen, and we got your friend involved in it.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Save those words for later! What step are you at in your measures?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: We've already sent officers to every expressway and city exit so we can conduct vehicle-to-vehicle inspections...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Clammin' up again? What gives?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: (Lifts up handheld device)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: You're in the world's nuttiest situation and you still got time to play video games?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: You don't got a lick of sense.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: What, sick of games now? On your phone again?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: ...I brought this phone from Higashi.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: So?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I can't use a Higashinese phone in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Huh.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Lemme see what you're typing there.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Clam it and give me the phone!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: No way! Never ever!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: You give me that—
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Cazzo, a traffic jam?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Great, perfect. I got my hands free now, ragazza. You give the phone and let me see. If you're not blabbin' to nobody about nothing, we won't have a problem.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I promise you, I'm not doing anything that would be unbeneficial to you!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: The hell's a promise do? If promises meant shit, would I have gotten duped all the way out to here?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Just give me the damn phone!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I'm gonna lock it first, okay?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: No, you're not—
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I think whoever's in the car over has been staring at us!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Merda!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I'm not typing anymore, I'm putting the phone away, I'm gonna keep playing games, okay?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Okay, you've been going 'ah' every coupla minutes and nothing else. What the hell is it?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I, uh... I've died four or five times on this stage. I... I think I'm tilted.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Am I messing you up here?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: (Instinctively pulls out phone)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: The hell you think you're up to?!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Sorry—sorry! I just did it automatically!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Huh.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Once I'm back in Siracusa, I'll let you go, and you can text your texts, game your games, nobody'll bother you.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: You're seriously going back to Siracusa?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: The hell else am I gonna go? Cousin sent me packing to Lungmen like a dumbass, said business here was honey and wine... Whose honey? Ain't no business worth nothing!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I'm telling you, they baited him in, he joined up with a famiglia, and figured he'd get his own little errand boy!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I spent months holding my breath, following him and his business around until I was drowning in all their petty shit. Said I wanted to go home once! Just once! And he robs a jewelry store, pins all the charges on me!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I ain't about to throw away decades a million miles from home!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I got my mamma and papà in Siracusa! They were begging me like crazy before I left, but I was stupider than bricks, and not one word, I didn't listen to one word they said...
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I just wanna go home, wanna see them! One more time! And if the powers that be say I'm a coward and decide to sink me into a river, then that's the price I gotta pay!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: (Habitually pulls out phone and begins typing)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: (Quietly) Honestly... I don't wanna be away from home either.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: (Quietly) I went through a lot of my own pain getting out here, all the way from home...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Come again?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: You don't have a guide, though, even... Are you really gonna make it back to Siracusa?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Whaddaya want me to do? Ask the L.G.D.?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Sure, I got duped, but I'm still a mafioso. What, a suit walking right up to the fuzz? Saying 'I got set up?' You think they'll listen?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: If they don't wanna listen to you, then it doesn't matter how much you tell them, they're just gonna go by their preconceptions so they can misinterpret whatever you say. I know that.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Okay, see, I thought you were just gonna risk your life begging me to 'explain the situation' to an L.G.D.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: But, uh, even if you can't convince them, you're probably not gonna die... On the other hand, if you run into trouble in the wasteland then you're definitely never making it back.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Hold on.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Hold on, that—is that an L.G.D. roadblock?! Are they checking cars?!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Hey, and I see you pulled out your phone again, huh?!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: You were sending the L.G.D. a nice little tip-off after all! Gimme that damned thing—
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Cease!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Kirara, get out of the car now! We're Rhodes Island operators, we're here for you!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: God damned L.G.D. laphounds!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Kirara, grab my hand—
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: What is it? Why are you frozen? This is an urgent situation; whatever it is, you can save it for later!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Relax, Kirara, I got your collection out the trunk already. You get out of the car with Akafuyu. L.G.D.'ll take care of the perp!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Utage?!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: A—Alright!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: (Sighs)
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Okay, guy kinda gave us the runaround, but you're alright, the luggage you were protecting the whole way's fine, it's all good. Medetashi, medetashi.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Kirara, hello?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I know you're in shock, but, like, you're gonna block traffic if you keep standing there, okay?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Oh! Sorry...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: You got your fruit tea, you've tried Lungmen's famous finballs. I bet you feel calmer now, right, girl?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Um... mmhm. Thanks, Utage.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Lemme get you introduced. This real samurai-vibey lady's Rhodes Island Operator Akafuyu. Should've been her sitting in the car, actually, with the robber guy.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: She's the whole 'guide' he was talking about.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: The... young Higashinese-dressed Ægir woman... he was looking for... was her?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Indeed. The L.G.D. has been following him, but scared of alarming him, they had me act the guide, so he could be seized at an opportune moment.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Who knew I'd be so careless, and even draw you in, Kirara. I am truly sorry to startle you.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: It's... alr...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: (Habitually fishes out phone)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: (Alarmedly rummages for phone)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: It's not polite to send your thanks via text if they're right in front of you, girl.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: N—No... I left my phone in that car!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Chill, we'll pick out a new one for you in a bit. Call it a little get-well-soon.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: But I've got a lot of important stuff on that phone, and I mean really, honestly important stuff!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: You got, like, game cheat codes on there? Or some kinda training notes so you can beat the super tough guys?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Okay... yes, both of those are in there but I don't mean them!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Utage, can we follow that car?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Akafuyu?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: This pursuit is in the L.G.D.'s hands now. If we give further chase, I fear we'll simply make trouble for them.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: She looks anxious for real to me.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I know her, and I don't think losing her entire collection forever in that car would, like, get to her as bad as this.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Right, Kirara?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: (Fiercely nods)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: If so, it's not as if we can't send word to the L.G.D. Where should we look for him, however, given he raced away from the checkpoint?
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: That's—no worries, I can handle that...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: You go, Kirara. What, you can pin your phone's location on your handheld or?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Actually, I modded all my electronics before I left so I could protect against losing anything, so they've all got relative tracking functions to each other...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Whoa, you got even crazier at modding tech stuff and I never knew!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Anyhow, that red point that's been moving the whole time is my phone's position, so it looks like that guy hasn't realized I left it in his car yet...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Given so, we have an easy in.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Utage, your classmate here is by no means of ordinary ability.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Preach it. All of my friends are showstoppers. I know that best.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Straight for five hundred meters and then take the next right.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: The way you've been, like, looking at the map on your console and then giving directions, it's kinda like you're playing a game.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: No, that's not really what's going on, I'm just... just looking at a map.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: This is no time for modesty, girl.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: ...resisting...
attributes.name: Voices From Far Away

attributes.content: ...give yourself up...
attributes.name: Voices From Far Away

attributes.content: No mistake. We've made dead heat on the target!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Stop resisting! Lay your weapons down, put your hands up and come out!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: I don't want none—none of you near me!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Let me go, I wanna leave Lungmen, I'm going back to Siracusa, I wanna go home!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Let it go! Now lay your weapons down, and we can still approach you with an open mind!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Like hell! I know what you're gonna do to me—I ain't no fool! I'm going home, dammit, I just need to get out of here and back to Siracusa!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: First that stupid cousin, then the 'famiglia,' and now you, and that girl just earlier, you're all out for blood! You're all filthy liars!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I want you all gone! Get out of my goddamn way! You're not fooling me no more! I'm going home!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: Shoot, I think he snapped.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: This is kind of a stalemate, so the L.G.D. are gonna go to force soon. I don't think we can guarantee your phone'll survive a firefight, and that guy is, like, the world vs. him at this point.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Akafuyu, you think we can slip in?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Absolutely not. The L.G.D. cannot ensure our safety should we intrude over the cordon. We can only pray the man calms down soon.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: I did ask the L.G.D. His jewelry store robbery had no casualties, which should mean they take him into custody.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Ugh, yeah, custody beats dying any day. So when's he gonna realize it, again?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: But he... said he was framed.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: While we were in the car he told me, he didn't actually rob that store, he was set up by somebody else.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Did he actually, factually say that?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Akafuyu, could you tell that to an L.G.D. guy for us, please?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I could, no issue, but the L.G.D. wouldn't let him walk on a single person's testimony.
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Still better than watching everyone fry right now! Go!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: Akafuyu

attributes.content: Maybe they'll change up their gameplan once they find out. Fingers crossed.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Let's get outta here for now, Kirara. I mean, you can tell, but we're just counting on other people at this point.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Final warning! Drop your weapons!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: If you still refuse to comply with the law, we will authorize the use of force!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Damn you all to hell! I get it, you just wanted me here all along so you could take my life!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Man

attributes.content: I'll count to ten! If you won't give yourself up before then, we WILL use force!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: One...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Shoot, I don't think she's gonna make it. Hey, Kirara, you might wanna prep mentally to...
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Kirara? What are you doing?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Kirara has her handheld up, and her finger is dancing all across the screen.
That's... not the console's interface, that's, like, beyond it. You made that? You're sending instructions from your own interface?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Two...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Three...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Four...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Are you trying to dial yourself from your console? You wanna get talking with him?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: It's just... a wake-up call.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Please, please...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Nine...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Ten!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: We are authorizing the use of force, all positions—
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Target sighted, no weapons on person!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Target is stripped of all arms...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Your hospitalization procedures are all in order, Miss Kirara.
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: (Taps on phone screen)
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: 'thanks'?
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: No problem!
attributes.name: HR Operator

attributes.content: Kirara, come on, didn't I tell you? It's so rude to type when you're literally, like, face to face!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: So... rry.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Eh, no big. I know it was more than a day or two that got you like this.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: C'mon, lemme show you where you're living!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Seriously, that night? Everything hanging in the balance? I thought he was gonna die.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Honestly, after all that and the shock you went through, you're incredible. I can't believe you testified for him anyway.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: So, did they pass his verdict yet?
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Doesn't happen that fast, girl.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: But I heard Akafuyu say the L.G.D. finished their investigation and figured out it wasn't actually him who held up the jewelry store. Now he's got charges for obstructing public duty and... something, whatever it was? I don't remember.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Considering he also kinda got baited into the mafia too, he'll probably get a year and a half and then deported out.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Which, like, it only panned out this way thanks to you.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: All I did was make him notice my phone, and that was it.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: He saw what was on there and realized I wasn't lying to him while I was in the car. Wasn't more than that.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Seriously? Sooo what kinda spell did you put in your phone to make a hard-boiled guy like that give himself up?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: It wasn't a spell or anything, just some super normal stuff.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: You sure?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Of course I'm sure!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: So normal, you won't even let me see?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: You seriously don't need to, I'm not kidding!
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Not gonna push you, then.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Bye-bye, Kirara. Get some sleep if you're worn out, okay?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: It's not a spell or incantation or anything, it's just...
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Just some stuff I need to copy and mail out.
attributes.name: Kirara

attributes.content: Kirara fishes out her phone, and scrolls the whole way down her drafts, until she hits the day she set out.
Since leaving that nomadic city she called home, her phone's mail service has been out of commission.
But leaving home for the first time, the girl still records everything she sees, hears, feels and thinks, no matter how big or small, in her drafts folder.
Kirara pulls a sheet of letter paper from her drawer, and copies from her drafts, going character by character, by word, by sentence.
A folder filled both with great chunks of text, and messy fragments of phrases.

attributes.text: 'day 2. completely out of nomadic city signal range today, no more using phone to stay in touch anymore. dont worry though, once im at rhodes island like utage says, ill send you all a million letters.'
'day 5. sat in a car the whole day. insanely bumpy over the wasteland, couldnt even play my handheld the whole way or else id throw up.'

'day 11. in yan now, road suddenly got way better! plants look kind of like home here but also kind of not, could only vaguely tell, i dont know plants much anyway. driver switched to someone yanese too, looks really tough but actually kind of chill, gave me some snacks apparently specialty of yan. wonder if theres a lot of yanese people at rhodes island?'

attributes.content: Kirara devotedly copies, filling page after letter page, until she reaches the draft dated latest.

attributes.text: 'day 34. finally in lungmen! agreed to meet utage in the city tonight, but she said something came up and she couldnt make it and someone else would meet up with me. she likes joking a lot though so maybe shell actually show up.

'waited on an empty stomach the whole day until the guy whos meeting me finally showed up. seems kind of unapproachable. hope its not all guys like him at rhodes island or else im never gonna be able to say a word.
'i think i got in the wrong car. drivers not rhodes island, hes siracusan mafia. he says hes going to go back to siracusa what do i do
'he got framed from the start, he just wants to go home.

'ive been missing home the whole time actually, i just held it in and never wrote about it before. everythings really nice in yan, but the food keeps being different everywhere and i cant get used to it, i always get stomach aches, i cant use my phone i cant send mail i cant chat with my friends i dont even have the guts to talk to anyone its horrible, the wind is really harsh in the wastes and sand got in my eyes nobody even helped me i just had to get it out with a napkin myself

'if i make it out of here alive and if my oripathy gets stable when rhodes island is in higashi i promise ill come back to see you i promise ill be a cheerful happy person i wont worry you anymore i promise'

attributes.content: The draft abruptly ends there.
Kirara tears up the sheet that contains this draft, crumples it into a ball, and throws it on the floor.
She locks her phone screen, and on a fresh sheet of paper writes anew, 'day 34'.

attributes.text: 'day 34. finally in lungmen! me and utage met up in the city, utage took me to rhodes island. no twists along the way at all, it all went smooth.
